dcterms:description: Contains over 11,000 images and 9,000 annotations recorded as a 25 Hz video during about a 9-minute long ride in Paris. The images have a relatively low resolution of 640×480 pixels. All labels were annotated manually as bounding boxes (BBoxes) with object IDs for tracking evaluation. The TL state was labeled as green, orange, red, or ambiguous.
dcterms:title: La Route Automatisée (LaRa) dataset

dcterms:creator: M. B. Jensen
M. P. Philipsen
A. Møgelmose
T. B. Moeslund
M. M. Trivedi
dcterms:description: Contains over 40,000 images, originating from the Vision for Intelligent Vehicles and Application (VIVA) challenge, which included the traffic light detection benchmark. The data was captured as a 10 Hz video using a stereo camera with an image resolution of 1280 × 960 pixels. Additionally, depth disparity maps for each image are provided. The dataset consists of a training subset and a test subset, the latter is kept private to serve as the basis for benchmarking.
dcterms:title: LISA Traffic Light Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Behrendt
L. Novak
R. Botros
dcterms:description: Recorded along the El Camino Real in California’s San Francisco Bay Area using a stereo camera. The dataset includes the corresponding disparity maps. All labels were annotated manually utilizing 15 classes to describe the color and pictogram of the TLs.
dcterms:title: Bosch Small Traffic Lights Dataset (BSTLD)

dcterms:creator: A. Fregin
J. Muller
U. Krebel
K. Dietmayer
dcterms:description: Published in 2016, this dataset has a number of images comparable to LISA but exceeds all other datasets in terms of the number of annotations (more than 230,000). Images with a resolution of 2048×1024 pixels were recorded by a stereo camera with a frame rate of 15 Hz. The dataset includes the corresponding disparity maps.
dcterms:title: DriveU Traffic Light Dataset (DTLD) v1.0

dcterms:creator: A. Fregin
J. Muller
U. Krebel
K. Dietmayer
dcterms:description: Released in 2021 as an extension of the DTLD v1.0. It contains images of the same resolution and frame rate but covers a broader range of traffic scenarios, such as roundabouts and T-junctions.
dcterms:title: DriveU Traffic Light Dataset (DTLD) v2.0

dcterms:creator: J. Janosovits
dcterms:description: Contains images with fine annotations from the Cityscapes dataset with additional TL labels for four attributes: type, relevant, visible, and state.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes TL++ dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Yang
J. Yan
W. Liao
X. Yang
J. Tang
T. He
dcterms:description: Detecting small, cluttered and rotated objects via instance-level feature denoising and rotation loss smoothing.
dcterms:title: S2TLD

dcterms:creator: David Kirchhoff
Philip Hoang
dcterms:description: COCO Dataset Extensions for Driving Tasks, where TL states were annotated in the images from the COCO dataset.
dcterms:title: COCO Traffic

dcterms:description: A modified version of the Udacity Self-Driving Car Dataset that includes labeled TL states.
dcterms:title: Roboflow Self-Driving Car dataset

dcterms:description: A modified version of the Udacity Self-Driving Car Dataset that includes labeled TL states.
dcterms:title: Udacity Self-Driving Car Dataset

dcterms:description: Waymo Open Dataset, which includes labeled TL states.
dcterms:title: Waymo Open Dataset

dcterms:creator: Z. Chen
X. Huang
dcterms:description: Accurate and reliable detection of traffic lights using multiclass learning and multiobject tracking.
dcterms:title: WPI

dcterms:description: A diverse driving dataset for heterogeneous multitask learning.
dcterms:title: BDD100K

dcterms:description: ApolloScape Dataset, which includes labeled TL states.
dcterms:title: ApolloScape

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset for semantic urban scene understanding.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
